thread.section_title: Nelson Alexander Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Nelson Alexander | www.nelsonalexander.com.au
thread.title: Michele and Stefania
thread.title_full: Nelson Alexander reviewed by Michele and Stefania

author: Michele and Stefania
title: Michele and Stefania
text: We have several investment properties and, since we engage Shannon Property Manager at Nelson Alexander, we "can slip between two pillows"! Properties are regularly inspected and comprehensive reports timely provided for our record. Any issue with the tenants is immediately addressed and resolved. We would recommend Nelson Alexander (and Shannon in particular) to investors...And tenants.
